bridge-type.label: Gateway
bridge-type.description: The gateway is needed for the other things to be able to communicate. It deals with the integration between this binding and the Fibaro gateway. Add this prior to other things.

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Ip address
parameter.description: Ip address to the Fibaro controller

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port used by the Fibaro controller to send updates

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Admin username to the Fibaro controller.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Admin password to the Fibaro controller.

parameter.name: ohIpAddress
parameter.label: OpenHAB address
parameter.description: Ip address to the OpenHAB gateway. Used by the Fibaro controller script to send events.

parameter.name: scriptName
parameter.label: Fibaro script name
parameter.description: The name of the script to generate on the Fibaro controller.
